schemaDescription: cluster_name: string: The name of the Harvester cluster to download the kubeconfig for.

kubeconfig_path: string: The local file path to write the kubeconfig to. Supports {cluster} token.
Defaults to "~/.kube/rancher-{cluster}.yaml".
context: string: The Rancher project/context ID to use for login. If not provided, uses the persisted context.
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: "cluster_name: str, kubeconfig_path: str='~/.kube/config', context: Optional[str]=None"
